properties.name: list
properties.description: List of objects with title property that reflect titles for radio buttons

properties.name: spaceBetweenItems
properties.description: Setup space after each radio item except the last one

properties.name: objectMode
properties.description: In this mod, the value will represent an object, comparison of active radio button made by id property of the option

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: The radio button will be deselected when the value is equals to true

properties.name: name
properties.description: With this property Radio will be listening to validation with current value for e.g. 'validateTest'

properties.name: touchName
properties.description: With this property, Radio component will listen to event with prefix 'touch' + and this property capitalized
